name: Acting as a Slit-Eyed Villain Perfectly
summary: Known as the Monster in an Iron Mask, the Demon of the Northern Front, the Smiling Executioner, he bears many fierce nicknames, each a testament to the multitude of enemies hes made. Showing even a hint of weakness meant a certain and brutal end, torn apart mercilessly.So, much as I loathe the idea, as much as I detest it, I must perfectly embody Yulian. I have to become the sinister, deranged character with slit eyes that everyone in the empire fears.Trait [Formal Speech]: You, without exception, address everyone, children and adults alike, with respect.How can a soliloquy be so exaggerated?
author: Xlordfifth
